includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: An ailing music mogul searches for his successor, but which of his sons will prove worthy? Hit hip hop drama starring Terrence Howard and a Golden Globe-winning Taraji P Henson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An ailing music mogul searches for his successor, but which of his sons will prove worthy? Hit hip hop drama with Terrence Howard and Taraji P Henson.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An ailing music mogul searches for his successor, but which of his sons will prove worthy? Hit hip hop drama starring Terrence Howard and a Golden Globe-winning Taraji P Henson.

includedAssets.title: The Outspoken King
includedAssets.synopsis: Empire is embroiled in controversy when one of its artists is involved in a shooting, while Jamal and Hakeem are caught in the middle when Lucious and Cookie lock horns.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Empire is embroiled in controversy when one of its artists is involved in a shooting, while Lucious and Cookie lock horns.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Empire is embroiled in controversy when one of its artists is involved in a shooting, while Jamal and Hakeem are caught in the middle when Lucious and Cookie lock horns.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: There's hip hop and high drama in this smash-hit US series starring Terrence Howard as Lucious Lyon, an ailing music mogul trying to decide which of his sons should inherit his record label empire. However, matters are complicated when his livewire ex-wife Cookie (played by a Golden Globe-winning Taraji P Henson) gets out of prison and re-enters his life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Smash-hit US series about an ailing music mogul (Terrence Howard) who is trying to decide which of his sons should inherit his record label empire.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: There's hip hop and high drama in this smash-hit US series starring Terrence Howard as Lucious Lyon, an ailing music mogul trying to decide which of his sons should inherit his record label empire. However, matters are complicated when his livewire ex-wife Cookie (played by a Golden Globe-winning Taraji P Henson) gets out of prison and re-enters his life.

includedIn.title: Empire
includedIn.synopsis: After music mogul and former drug dealer Lucious Lyon is diagnosed with a terminal illness, he pits his three sons against one another to decide who will succeed him.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A terminally ill music mogul and former drug dealer pits his three sons against one another to determine who will succeed him.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After music mogul and former drug dealer Lucious Lyon is diagnosed with a terminal illness, he pits his three sons against one another to decide who will succeed him.
